body: In form users must to upload at least 2 images.

OK. Not against adding it but since 2.0.14 will be the last feature-release and there are many things we want to get it, the only chance is if you'll prepare a pull request. Else it will be added into 2.1.

issue.title: FileValidator added minFiles property

body:
I think it's right to specify the interval.
Example 
```php
['min' => 2, 'max' => 4];
['min' => 2]; // max - unlimited
['max' => 2]; // min - 0 to 2
[]; // not filled interval
```
